data.eml:eml: A new genus for a Chilean species of Acanthosomatidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Faúndez, Eduardo I. (2014): A new genus for a Chilean species of Acanthosomatidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera). Zootaxa 3768 (5): 596-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3768.5.7
